about_the_game:
A Mystical Journey Through a World on the Brink of Chaos
Broken Relic is a narrative-driven, pixel art, point-and-click adventure set in a dark, fantastical world. Explore richly detailed environments, solve clever puzzles, meet eccentric characters, and uncover the secrets of a broken world in a tale where humor and darkness collide.

Key Features:

  • Darkly Humorous Adventure: A blend of wit and mystery as you navigate a world that is both grim and absurd.

  • Classic Point-and-Click Gameplay: Interact with a cast of quirky characters, solve intricate puzzles, and piece together the relic’s history.

  • Immersive World: Traverse diverse scenarios, from ancient ruins to eerie underworld caverns, each filled with secrets and puzzles.

  • Handcrafted pixels: A visually stunning homage to classic adventure games with dark fantasy influences.

short_description: Broken Relic is a point-and-click adventure where you accidentally awaken an ancient evil. Set in a dark, fantastical world, you must uncover the truth behind a shattered relic, solve clever puzzles, and journey across strange lands to restore what was broken before the world falls into chaos.
